channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report X-2024020938
item.description:
Report X-2024020938

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-03
  • City: FORT DODGE
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found while unloading trailer Package handlers noticed box was a hazmat package and was visibly wet and package handler stopped the sort and notified manager DescribePack: Box had other Items stacked on top of it causing the lid to become damaged and leak onto box below DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Stopped the line evacuated trailer while Manager on duty got PPE and removed leaking package and other damaged package from trailer in a hazmat tote for proper cleanup
